```{r}
library(tidyverse)
theme_set(theme_bw())
```

```{r}
all_info = read_csv(file = "./img/all_info.csv")
```

# Tabulating

```{r}
model_airline_summ = all_info %>% 
  group_by(model, airline) %>% 
  tally() %>% 
  arrange(desc(n)) %>% 
  ungroup()


model_airline_summ %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = model, y = fct_reorder(airline, n),
             fill = n, label = n)) +
  geom_tile() +
  geom_text() +
  scale_fill_distiller(palette = "Spectral") +
  theme_classic()
```
